page.title: 08 HOME LIFE
page.content: My name is Helen and I am 9 years old. I get up at half past seven.I go into the bathroom and wash my hands and face,then I go to my bedroom and get dressed. I go downstairs, let Jim our dog outside,then I have a breakfast of cornflakes and toast.At halfpast eight we walk to school,which takes about ten minutes and which starts at nine.The main lessons are usually English,Maths, History,R.E.and Geography.At halfpast three we go home. I usually change into trousers and have something to eat and drink,then I go out to play.At six oclock we have dinner. Afterwards I do my piano practice. At halfpast seven I get undressed washed and ready for bed and then go downstairs and watch televison or read a book for a while. Later I say goodnight to Mum and Dad,give them both a hug,then I go upstairs brush my teeth and go to bed.
